mapper.select: SELECT bbi.*, tr.*, student.* FROM transport_record AS tr LEFT JOIN picked_students_info AS psi ON psi.transport_record_id = tr.id LEFT JOIN student ON student.id = psi.student_id LEFT JOIN bus_line ON bus_line.id = tr.bus_line LEFT JOIN bus_base_info AS bbi ON bbi.id = bus_line.bus_base_info WHERE DATE_FORMAT( tr.date, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) >= #{queryStartTime} AND DATE_FORMAT( tr.date, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) <= #{queryFinishTime} AND bbi.number = #{busNumber} AND student.bus_line_morning != tr.bus_line

SELECT bbi.*,tr.*, student.* FROM transport_record AS tr LEFT JOIN picked_students_info AS psi ON psi.transport_record_id = tr.id LEFT JOIN student ON student.id = psi.student_id LEFT JOIN bus_line ON bus_line.id = tr.bus_line LEFT JOIN bus_base_info AS bbi ON bbi.id = bus_line.bus_base_info WHERE DATE_FORMAT( tr.date, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) >= #{queryStartTime} AND DATE_FORMAT( tr.date, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) <= #{queryFinishTime} AND bbi.number = #{busNumber} AND student.bus_line_afternoon != tr.bus_line

SELECT tr.*, psi.*, student.*, banji.*,banji.class_name as banji_name FROM transport_record AS tr LEFT JOIN picked_students_info AS psi ON psi.transport_record_id = tr.id LEFT JOIN student ON psi.student_id = student.id LEFT JOIN banji ON banji.id = student.banji WHERE tr.id = #{TransportRecordId} -- 晚班选了已选 ，但是没有学生上车，等没有学生上车记录的情况 and student.id is not null
